description: A traditional 1/4 zip with a California mountain-inspired Fair Isle pattern at the center. This sweater is perfect for getting cozy at the ski lodge, bringing joy to holiday get-togethers, or a night of sloshing through the snow. Most importantly, it’s packed with non-mulesed Merino wool so it resists odors keeping you fresh and warm.
name: Royal Robbins Sequoia 1/4 Zip Sweater - Mens
